com.cleo.lexicom.external

Interface IMailboxController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IMailboxController
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Establishes an interface for sending and receiving payload through a specific mailbox. Refer to ILexiCom.getMailboxController(String[]). Also refer to ISessionScript.getMailboxController() and its variants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CLIENT_SERVER_ROLE
      Property which which contains the client/server role used for the file transfer.
      static java.lang.String COLLECT
      Receive property which when included and set to "False" indicates that the receive() method should not return files previously received.
      static java.lang.String GET_SOURCE
      Source filename property which can be used in receive() method parameters object.
      static java.lang.String PROTOCOL
      Property which which contains the protocol used for the file transfer.
      static java.lang.String PUT_DESTINATION
      Destination filename property which can be used in send() method parameters object.
      static java.lang.String PUT_OPTIONS
      PUT command options property which can be used in send() method parameters object.
      static java.lang.String SET_PREFIX
      Send() and receive() parameters can contain advanced property settings, but the property name must be prefixed by "Set.".
      static java.lang.String USERNAME
      Property which which contains the user name associated with a file transfer.
      static java.lang.String VERSALEX_SERIAL_NUMBER_SHORT
      Property which which contains the VersaLex serial number associated with a file transfer.

    • Field Detail

      • PUT_DESTINATION

        static final java.lang.String PUT_DESTINATION
        Destination filename property which can be used in send() method parameters object. For protocols supporting directories (FTP, SSH FTP), can contain a directory path. If only a directory path (and not a filename) is being specified, the property should end in a File.separator (actually either '/' or '\' is supported). For destination paths that support URI access to a connector host, this is the resource path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PUT_OPTIONS

        static final java.lang.String PUT_OPTIONS
        PUT command options property which can be used in send() method parameters object. Value can be space-separated set of PUT options valid for the protocol
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_SOURCE

        static final java.lang.String GET_SOURCE
        Source filename property which can be used in receive() method parameters object. For protocols supporting directories (FTP, SSH FTP), can contain a directory path. If only a directory path (and not a filename) is being specified, the property should end in a File.separator (actually either '/' or '\' is supported) and VersaLex will assume all files within the directory should be retrieved. For source paths that support URI access to a connector host, this is the resource path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COLLECT

        static final java.lang.String COLLECT
        Receive property which when included and set to "False" indicates that the receive() method should not return files previously received.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERSALEX_SERIAL_NUMBER_SHORT

        static final java.lang.String VERSALEX_SERIAL_NUMBER_SHORT
        Property which which contains the VersaLex serial number associated with a file transfer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USERNAME

        static final java.lang.String USERNAME
        Property which which contains the user name associated with a file transfer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROTOCOL

        static final java.lang.String PROTOCOL
        Property which which contains the protocol used for the file transfer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLIENT_SERVER_ROLE

        static final java.lang.String CLIENT_SERVER_ROLE
        Property which which contains the client/server role used for the file transfer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SET_PREFIX

        static final java.lang.String SET_PREFIX
        Send() and receive() parameters can contain advanced property settings, but the property name must be prefixed by "Set.".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getHostProtocol

        int getHostProtocol()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the protocol for the mailbox's host
        Returns:
        either HTTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, FTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, OFTP_CLIENT, SSHFTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, MQ_CLIENT, SMTP_CLIENT, or MLLP_CLIENT
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMailboxPackaging

        int getMailboxPackaging()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the packaging for the mailbox
        Returns:
        either NONE, AS2, AS3, ebMS, RNIF, OpenPGP, XML Encryption, or WS
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
